org.openimaj.image.analysis.watershed.feature

Class PixelsFeature

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openimaj.image.pixel.PixelSet
      • org.openimaj.image.pixel.ConnectedComponent
        • org.openimaj.image.analysis.watershed.feature.PixelsFeature
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cloneable, Iterable<Pixel>, ComponentFeature, Readable, ReadableASCII, ReadableBinary, ReadWriteable, Writeable, WriteableASCII, WriteableBinary

    public class PixelsFeature
extends ConnectedComponent
implements ComponentFeature
    PixelsFeature is used to dynamically create the ConnectedComponents corresponding to MSERs.
    Author:
    Jonathon Hare (jsh2@ecs.soton.ac.uk)
